landing.heroDescription: Organise notes, practice with flashcards, review past papers, and track your progress—all in one powerful platform designed for students.

landing.whyChooseSubtitle: Join thousands of students who are already improving their study habits

landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Study Habits?
landing.ctaDescription: Start organizing your studies today. It's free to get started.
